title: nThrive Education and Services Showcased at HFMA ANI Annual Conference
description:
nThrive™ will showcase its Patient-to-Payment℠ suite of solutions in booth 1721 at the Healthcare Financial Management Association Annual National
Institute (HFMA ANI) Conference. nThrive provides a unique combination of technology,
services, advisory, analytics and education solutions to systematically address business issues.
The result is sustainable, long-term financial improvement through increased revenue yield,
streamlined cash flow and reduced cost to collect. Visitors to the nThrive booth can participate
in a solution demonstration that will feature the most comprehensive Patient-to-Payment
resource in health care.

title: nThrive Helps Meet Health Care Job Shortages Supporting Careers for Military Veterans at HFMA ANI 2017
description:
nThrive™, an independent Patient-to-Payment℠ solutions company, is supporting Hire Heroes USA through donations at booth 1721 during the
Healthcare Financial Management Association Annual National Institute (HFMA ANI)
Conference. The company will also showcase its exclusive nThrive Education™ Transitions
program that is helping health care providers address job shortages, while giving back to
veterans who have served our country.

title: Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services
description: Millions of dollars are spent on meeting quality reporting requirements every year. Simplifying the reporting requirements is a great goal for CMS but true long-term value will only come from automating and further streamlining quality reporting capabilities. That's where a proven analytics company, like nThrive, can help make all the difference when it comes to getting in front of not just MIPS reporting but Population Health Management overall.

title: nThrive Open House
description: Join nThrive for an open house with our talent acquisition and management teams to learn more about many career opportunities available in the Winston-Salem area at several Wake Forest Baptist locations. We have many openings in the areas of patient access, billing, and coding including supervisory opportunities. Please choose the time slot that you prefer and bring your resume with you to the event. If you have any questions, please contact nThrive Talent Acquisition at 866-773-2973 X2.

title: What Is MIPS (Merit-based Incentive Payment System)?
description: The Merit-based Incentive Payment System, also called MIPS, is a new Medicare reimbursement program for physicians. Learn more about the program at nThrive.com.
context: The Merit-based Incentive Payment System, aka MIPS, is one of the two tracks for value-based reimbursement under MACRA and the Quality Payment Program. Read this blog from nThrive to learn more about MIPS in healthcare.

title: Does your claims management solution fit the bill? Answer this quick poll to find out!
description:
Are your claims being denied due to medical necessity errors? Do you have a high rejection rate at your clearinghouse? Do you have an inconsistent clean claim rate? Take this poll to find out if your claims management solution fits the bill.
